incidents.name: [RBX4][Dedicated Servers] - Room 53 incident notification
incidents.message: We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Dedicated Servers offer on the specific room 53. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 30/01/2026 12:05 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Some servers in the specific room are temporarily unavailable. Customers Impact : Some customers are temporarily unable to access and use their servers in room 53. Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
